heisig_chinese_memo: Every rising cloud is a potential rain cloud.
heisig_constituent: cloud, rain, weather, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall
heisig_story: Here is the full character for cloud from which the primitive for a rising cloud derives. Clouds begin with vapors rising up in small clouds from the surface of the earth, and then gathering to make clouds that eventually dump their rain back on the earth.
koohiiStory1: Every rising cloud is a potential rain cloud. (Thanks astridtops).
koohiiStory2: Every cloud is a potential rain cloud.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A rain cloud is still a cloud! It's probably going to rain on you soon though, so I hope you have a jacket or an umbrella.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture all of the different types of clouds in the sky. There are puffy white ones, heavy dark ones, and wispy thin ones. But they're all clouds.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You lie down and try to figure out what the clouds are shaped like. The first cloud is shaped... like a cool mom (くも). She's wearing high pants, and holding a kid on each hip, but she's also listening to the latest music and using slang. Huh. You look to the next cloud and see... wait, another cool mom?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You look at each cloud and each one is a different cool mom. They're each doing different cool mom things. You suddenly don't want to look at the clouds anymore.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 云 (いう、ウン говорить, слова).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 二 (два), 厶 (значок МУ), 雨 (дождь)
Ru_trainchinese:
yún: (сущ) облако
yún: (сущ) Юнь (провинция Юньнань, сокращение)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Every rising cloud is a potential rain cloud.
origin_of_ch_char_book: Rain is expressed as (雨, yu=yü, rain). It shows raindrops falling from the sky. A cloud is composed of water vapor, and floats in the sky by the wind. (雲, 云, yun=yün, cloud) means rain , vapor or steam on the above, and something whirling beneath it . It describes the cloud whirling in the sky. These characters combined to mean “a cloud which carries rain”. With the implementation of simplified Chinese, now the character 雲 (yun=yün, cloud) has been changed to the simple form (云, yun=yün, cloud), meaning a cloud.
humanum_short_description_en: " Cloud " is the ancient prose of " cloud ", "Shuowen": "The atmosphere of mountains and rivers. From the rain, the cloud turns like a cloud. All clouds are from the cloud. The ancient text saves the rain. It is also the ancient text." " Cloud ".
humanum_short_description: 「云」是「雲」的古文，《說文》：「山川气也。从雨，云象雲回轉形。凡雲之屬皆从雲。云，古文省雨。，亦古文雲。」參「云」。

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: Rain 雨 falling from a cloud 云
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 雨 [ yǔ ] rain
    • 云 [ yún ] cloud; to say, to speak
①說話，引文：人云亦云。子曰詩云。云云(如此，這樣；引用文句或談話時，表示結束或有所省略)。
②文言助詞，句首句中句末都用：雲誰之思？歲雲暮矣，着記時也雲。
③水氣上升遇冷凝聚成微小的水珠，成團地在空中飄浮：行雲流水。雲蒸霞蔚。
④指中國“雲南省”：雲腿(雲南省出產的火腿)。雲煙(雲南省出產的香菸)。
雲南 [ yún nán ]: Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇 or 云 , capital Kunming 昆明
云云 [ yún yún ]: and so on; so and so; many and confused

雲字的基本解释

雲
yún
见“云”③④。

雲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
(1)由水滴、冰晶聚集形成的在空中悬浮的物体。
(2)喻指轻柔舒卷如云之物。
(3)喻指浓酒。
(4)喻指墨汁。
(5)比喻盛多。
(6)借指高空。
(7)世代相隔较远的。参见“雲仍”。
(8)宋代蜀方言。指疯病患者。
(9)中医指湿气。
(10)古乐舞名。即《云门》。
(11)古代官名。传说黄帝时以云纪官，故称。参见“雲紀”。
(12)指男女欢爱之事。
(13)地名。指秦云中郡。
(14)地名。云南省的省称。
(15)古楚国云梦泽的省称。参见“雲中”、“雲夢”。
(16)姓。隋有云定兴。见《隋书》本传。

雲字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　雲； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1372第05
【唐韻】【集韻】王分切【韻會】【正韻】于分切，?音云。【說文】山川气也。从雨云，象雲回轉形。【廣韻】河圖曰：雲者，天地之本。【元命包】隂陽聚爲雲。【易·乾卦】雲行雨施。　又【詩·大雅】倬彼雲漢。【傳】雲漢，天河也。　又【爾雅·釋親】仍孫之子爲雲孫。【註】言輕遠如浮雲。　又【周禮·春官·大司樂】舞雲門大卷。【註】周所存六代之樂，黃帝曰雲門大卷。　又【史記·黃帝紀】官名，皆以雲命爲雲師。　又澤名。【書·禹貢】雲土夢作。又【左傳·定四年】楚子涉睢濟江，入于雲中。【爾雅·釋地】楚有雲夢。【疏】此澤跨江南北，亦得單稱雲，單稱夢。【司馬相如·子虛賦】雲夢者，方九百里。　又【拾遺記】蓬萊山，亦名雲來。　又郡縣名。【前漢·地理志】琅邪郡雲縣。又雲中郡。　又姓。【正字通】縉雲氏之後。唐雲洪嗣。明雲衢，雲岫。　又叶于員切。【?琳·馬瑙勒賦】初傷勿用，俟慶雲兮。君子窮達，亦時然兮。　【說文】通作云。

Basic explanation of words
cloud
yún

cloud
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" Wang divided cut, plain text, cloud. ]
(1) Objects suspended in the air formed by the aggregation of water droplets and ice crystals.
(2) The metaphor refers to things that are soft and soft like clouds.
(3) Yu refers to strong liquor.
(4) Metaphor refers to ink.
(5) More than Yu Sheng.
(6) By means of high altitude.
(7) The generations are far apart. See "cloud still".
(8) Shu dialect in Song Dynasty. Refers to patients with madness.
(9) Chinese medicine refers to moisture.
(10) Ancient music and dance names. That is "Cloud Gate".
(11) Ancient official names. Legend has it that the Yellow Emperor used Yun as the official official, hence the name. See "Yun Ji".
(12) Refers to the love of men and women.
(13) Place name. Refers to Qin Yunzhong County.
(14) Place name. The provincial name of Yunnan Province.
(15) Ancient Chu State Yunmengze's provincial name. See "in the cloud", "cloud dream".
(16) Last name. Sui Youyun Dingxing. See the biography of "Sui Shu".
cloud

[Guangyun] Hetu said: The cloud is the foundation of heaven and earth. [Yin Ming Bao] Yin and Yang gather together into clouds. [Yi·Qian Gua] Clouds and rains are applied.　[Poetry·Daya] Zhuobiyunhan. [Biography] Yunhan, Tianhe also.　[Erya·Shiqin] The son of the grandson is Yunsun. [Note] Words are as light as clouds.　[Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Da Si Le】Wuyunmen big scroll. [Note] The music of the six generations preserved in the Zhou Dynasty, the Yellow Emperor said the Cloud Gate Scroll.　[Historical Records·Huangdiji] official names, all with Yunming as Yunshi.　Also known as Ze. [Book·Yugong] Cloud and earth dreams. Also [Zuo Zhuan·Ding Four Years] Chu Zi walked across the Jijiang River and entered the clouds. 【Erya·Shidi】Chu Youyunmeng. [Sparse] This ze crosses the north and south of the river, and it is also called cloud or dream. [Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu] Yunmeng, a square nine hundred li.　[Supplementary Notes] Penglai Mountain, also known as Yunlai.　Another county name. [Pre-Han Geography] Yun County, Langya County. And Yunzhong County.　Another last name. [Zhengzitong] After Jinyun's. Tang Yunhongsi. Ming Yun Qu, Yun Xiu.　Ye Yu Yuan cut again. [? Name meaning

yún
вм. 云
Radicals: 雨, 云  (rain, cloud)
Meaning Mnemonic
A rain cloud is still a cloud! It's probably going to rain on you soon though, so I hope you have a jacket or an umbrella.
Picture all of the different types of clouds in the sky. There are puffy white ones, heavy dark ones, and wispy thin ones. But they're all clouds.
Reading Mnemonic
You lie down and try to figure out what the clouds are shaped like. The first cloud is shaped... like a cool mom (くも). She's wearing high pants, and holding a kid on each hip, but she's also listening to the latest music and using slang. Huh. You look to the next cloud and see... wait, another cool mom?
You look at each cloud and each one is a different cool mom. They're each doing different cool mom things. You suddenly don't want to look at the clouds anymore.
